meanings.definition: Perioperative: relating to the period of time surrounding a surgical operation.
meanings.sent1: The nurses prepared the patient for the perioperative care.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a dedicated perioperative unit for surgical patients.
meanings.sent3: During the perioperative phase, the doctors wore colorful hats to lift spirits.
meanings.sent4: The hospital buzzed with activity during the perioperative period.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the operating room marked the start of the perioperative journey.

meanings.definition: Perioperative: occurring or used before, during, and after a surgical operation.
meanings.sent1: The perioperative team ensured all equipment was ready for the surgery.
meanings.sent2: The anesthesiologist played a crucial role in the perioperative process.
meanings.sent3: The clown entertained patients in the perioperative waiting area.
meanings.sent4: The perioperative checklist was meticulously followed to ensure safety.
meanings.sent5: The hospital staff worked seamlessly together in the perioperative period.
